XIII.i.7.A.2.b
.
BEST Responsibility for Home Loan Related Determinations
The benefit eligibility support team (BEST) division makes COD determinations under EP 290 when
requested by an RLC, and
a determination is required as provided in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 1.A.1
.
Use the claim label
Character of Discharge - LGY
(290CODLGY).
References
:  For more information on
providing certification to the RLC, see
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 7.A.2.i
claim labels for EP 290, see
M21-4, Appendix C, 1.b
jurisdiction over claims, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, 3
, and
routing of claims in NWQ, see the
NWQ Playbook
.
